attributes.action: Protect our dogs and cats (plus other animals) for the noise of fireworks
attributes.additional_details:
As a passionate advocate and pet professional, it is absolutely vital that we push the UK government to take a stand against the sale of fireworks that so tremendously distress our beloved pets.

The effect that fireworks have on animals cannot be downplayed - the deafening noise can reach levels as high as 120db, akin to the roar of a jumbo jet. This relentless cacophony can inflict lasting damage on the delicate ears of dogs, which are adversely affected at anything exceeding 85db.
attributes.background:
It is imperative that we advocate for the banning of the sale of fireworks.

By transitioning to alternative options that produce lower levels of noise, we can prioritise the well-being and comfort of our dogs and cats (plus other animals)

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700223
